title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: On Saturday theyhad all crossed the hill, to spend till JMonday atSinglie.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Two of them were the Misses Scott ofSinglie, who stayed in one of the cottages behindthe school, built by their father for the accommodation of his family.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: When they had proceededas far as Singlie, they were overtaken by thePresbytery officer on horseback, Andrew Johnstone,who was a character in his way.
